name: DOOM97.WAD --> DOOM97S.WAD
description: The very first Offline-Deathmatch level all over the Doom world, I hope. Your aim is to kill all the bad guys - except me. After doing that you have to running down the street, that's all - and perhaps a little bit more to do for you. There is only one absolute deadly trap in the level, so save your game every hour :*)
